result.eng: Not many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.
result.ga: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa Pharlaimint
result.orig: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa Pharlaimint
result.html: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá bhrí sin chaill sí a suíochán sa PharlaimintNot many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.
result.ponchtml: Níor vótáil mórán daoine ar a son agus dá ḃrí sin ċaill sí a suíoċán sa ṖarlaimintNot many people voted for her, and therefore, she lost her seat in Parliament.

result.eng: He made a sacrifice for the country.
result.ga: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíre
result.orig: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíre
result.html: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíreHe made a sacrifice for the country.
result.ponchtml: Rinne sé íobairt ar son na tíreHe made a sacrifice for the country.

result.eng: She abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ga: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.orig: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in Éirinn
result.html: Thréig sí a tír dhúchais ar son poist mar fheighlí linbh le teaghlach in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
result.ponchtml: Ṫréig sí a tír ḋúċais ar son poist mar ḟeiġlí linḃ le teaġlaċ in ÉirinnShe abandoned her native country for a job as a child minder with a family in Ireland.
